history.content:
<md>Future Of Us is hiring backend & front end website developers!

Future Of Us began over a year ago and is an online international platform that focuses on empowering youth to explore the future through literary means. Future Of Us is looking for coders to join the team and work under a director to improve the site before it launches across countries. Future Of Us currently has over 300 writers around the world and a maintenance team of over 100, and is looking to create a more sustainable website. The plans are all made and they’re just looking for dedicated members to help execute the project. Individuals who are capable of basic coding and utilizing resources like GitHub are preferred.

Hiring: They are hiring for up to 8 interns, through Fall and potentially afterwards. The workload would be no more than 2-3 hours a week at max (at your own schedule), but they are happy to discuss more flexible options. 

If interested, please feel free to fill out this form: https://forms.gle/RwgF7H3Pr23F5NVe9
For any questions please email: contact@futureofus.info</md>
history.subject: Exciting Internship Opportunities!
